column6: "A PLAGUE OF LOCUSTS" pt. 3 (of 4) The Torch makes horrific discoveries about the Locust Project. Now a very unwilling "special guest" of this small group of fanatics, Johnny must either join them... or join those who have "died for the cause." 32 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$2.99
column8: | writer:Karl Kesel | inker:Joe Seung | penciller (cover):Skottie Young
